doctor.name: Dr. A.K.M Shafiul Alam Ferdous
doctor.info: Dr. A.K.M Shafiul Alam Ferdous is a General Surgeon in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS, MS (Surgery). He is a Senior Consultant, Dept of Surgery at 300 Bed Hospital, Narayanganj. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. A.K.M Shafiul Alam Ferdous at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 11am to 2pm (Sat, Mon & Wed) & 5pm to 8pm (Sun & Thu).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. K. M. Ashraf Ali
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. K. M. Ashraf Ali is a General Surgeon in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), FICS (USA). He is a Professor, Dept of Surgery at Eastern Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Medinova Medical Services, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. K. M. Ashraf Ali at Medinova Medical Services, Narayanganj is 10am to 1pm & 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
